lead_paragraph: The task facing the San Jose Sharks is daunting: No team in nearly three quarters of a century has rallied from a 3-1 deficit to win the Stanley Cup Final.

headline.print_headline: Sharks Face Daunting Task Down 3-1 in Stanley Cup Final
headline.main: Sharks Face Daunting Task Down 3-1 in Stanley Cup Final
